image.altText: writing on a brick painted white

props.synopsis: Construction workers uncovered the message and went on a mission to track down the family of the man who left it there.

title.children: 65-year-old hidden message uncovered in roof of Old Parliament House

image.altText: Unit 36 22 Mowatt Street Queanbeyan East is one of the properties up for resale.

props.synopsis: Dozens of properties owners in the Queanbeyan region will have their homes and businesses sold by force if they don’t pay thousands of dollars in overdue rates payments owed to the local council.

title.children: Dozens of property owners to lose homes and businesses due to unpaid rates

image.altText: Photo illustration of NSW Police officer in silhouette and hands on phone to the left

props.synopsis: A complaint against a NSW Police sergeant was over an incident that allegedly took place during a long drive when he refused to stop the car to allow another officer to use the bathroom.

title.children: Outrage at NSW Police response to complaint against sergeant

image.altText: Two women wearing aprons gardening.

props.synopsis: Vanessa Brettell and Hannah Costello have employed and trained more than 60 migrant and refugee women through their social enterprise cafe Stepping Stone in Canberra. The pair have now been named Australia's Local Heroes for 2025.

title.children: Social enterprise cafe gives migrant and refugee women stepping stone to employment

image.altText: Man in blue wetsuit and red helmet sits in the back of a boat looking at a river.

props.synopsis: The body of a 37-year-old man who went missing in the Murrumbidgee River while being towed behind a boat on Australia Day has been found.

title.children: Body found in NSW river during two-day search for missing swimmer

image.altText: Twenty-four 100 dollar notes and twelve 50 dollar notes on a blue mat on the floor.

props.synopsis: NSW Crime Commission search for the owner of almost $1 million that was seized as part of a drug bust.

title.children: Search for owner of missing $1 million linked to NSW drug bust

image.altText: A woman works on a model lobster made from felt.

props.synopsis: A group of Darwin artists has recreated tropical mangrove ecosystems with fabric, felt and wire for an exhibition at Questacon in February.

title.children: Artists bring magic of tropical mangroves to life for Canberra exhibition

image.altText: A corrugated rain tank on a stand near a windmill with the bush and grass illuminated red by a fire at night.

props.synopsis: An accommodation and wedding venue and up to two homes in Victoria's west have been destroyed by a bushfire that has burnt through 65,000 hectares of land.

title.children: Lodge and up to two homes destroyed by bushfire in Victoria's west

image.altText: Sam Abdulrahim standing in a gym with boxing gloves on.

props.synopsis: Ex-Mongols bikie Sam Abdulrahim has been shot dead at a car park in Melbourne's north. It comes after multiple attempts on the underworld figure's life.

title.children: Victorian crime figure Sam 'The Punisher' Abdulrahim shot in broad daylight

image.altText: A while logo next to the word 'DeepSeek' on a phone screen sitting on top of a keyboard.

props.synopsis: The US was seen to have a major lead in the field of AI, and export bans in place were meant to keep it that way. China's new AI tool challenges those assumptions.

title.children: A 'wake-up call' from China threatens America's AI vision

image.altText: A man with short, greying hair – Energy Minister Chris Bowen – stands outdoors and speaks to the media.

props.synopsis: The federal government is pushing ahead with its renewable energy investment by expanding a scheme that subsidises property owners who are decarbonising their homes.

title.children: Funding to electrify homes expanded as Bowen slams 'nuclear fantasy'

image.altText: DOnald Trump speaks to reporters before boarding Airforce One, January 2025

props.synopsis: US President Donald Trump has signed an Executive Order removing protections for transgender people in the military.

title.children: What is DEI and why is Trump trying to get rid of it?

image.altText: A screenshot of a video posted to social media showing the aftermath of the explosion.

props.synopsis: An explosion at a food market visited just days earlier by the Chinese president has resulted in an unknown number of casualties.

title.children: Chinese censors suppress details of explosion at market visited by Xi Jinping

image.altText: Hands holding a jar of pills.

props.synopsis: Pressure is mounting on Australia's medicines regulator to tighten restrictions around vitamin B6 supplements, with more cases of people inadvertently poisoning themselves emerging.

title.children: The synthetic vitamin leaving several Australians with major health issues

image.altText: A young man in a black cap and t-shirt smiles with young fans behind him.

props.synopsis: Hobart Hurricanes' Mitch Owen is set for the global stage after a "life-changing" BBL final, say cricketing commentators.

title.children: Mitch Owen 'dished out punishment' and now the cricketing world is on alert

image.altText: Mother charged infant

props.synopsis: The 34-year-old, who cannot be named to protect the identity of the child, appeared in the Brisbane Magistrates Court on Tuesday, where she made an application for bail.

title.children: Influencer accused of drugging baby daughter with anticonvulsant medication

image.altText: A mugshot of a dark-haired man with a beard.

props.synopsis: An arrest warrant was issued for Hussein Chamas after he failed to appear in a Sydney court earlier this month.

title.children: Alleged drug trafficker arrested in NT after three weeks on the run

props.synopsis: Around the clock coverage of news events as they break at home and abroad.

title.children: ABC News Channel live

image.altText: Police  tape cordoning off the entrance to an apartment building.

props.synopsis: A sex worker tells a Queensland court she witnessed Joshua Wishart, 34, fatally striking 75-year-old Alfred Westmoreland in October 2023.

title.children: Sex worker tells of 'terrifying' moment client allegedly murdered elderly man

image.altText: Dr Megan Brooks - woman with black jacket and blue shirt and short hair walks out of coroners court

props.synopsis: A coronial inquest has heard that multiple attempts to escalate an emergency response were made after a ramping-related death in Adelaide, but staff were told the situation did not meet the criteria.

title.children: Hospital boss's attempt to escalate emergency response after ramping-related death denied, court hears

image.altText: An illustration of a finger tapping on a phone screen with a large padlock being shown on it.

props.synopsis: The ABC analysed 29 million stolen codes to help you avoid using an insecure one.

title.children: We looked at millions of stolen PINs and found the absolute worst one

image.altText: police vehicles on a suburban street

props.synopsis: The 23-year-old has been taken to hospital with life-threatening injuries after being shot three times by police.

title.children: Man critical after being shot three times by police in Townsville

image.altText: Yvonne Engelman, who survived the horrors of Auschwitz, looks into the camera at her home in Sydney

props.synopsis: Yvonne Engelman, who survived the horrors of the Nazi concentration camp Auschwitz, recalls her experiences as the world marks the 80th anniversary of liberation.

title.children: Australian survived Auschwitz when gas chamber 'didn't work'

image.altText: Two police officers in high-vis walking between polcie tape King Street in Newtown

props.synopsis: Police have arrested a third man after two off-duty police officers were allegedly assaulted in Sydney's inner west last week.

title.children: Third man arrested over alleged bashing of two off-duty police officers

image.altText: Sam Konstas of Australia fields during an Australia nets session, throwing the cricket ball

props.synopsis: Travis Head will open the batting for Australia in the first Test against Sri Lanka in Galle, leaving Sam Konstas in a battle for a middle order position to save his spot in the side.

title.children: Head to open in first Sri Lanka Test, Konstas at risk of being dropped

image.altText: Crowds at a harbour beach in Sydney on a summer day

props.synopsis: The Bureau of Meteorology issued a heatwave warning on Monday and said it would continue until Thursday.

title.children: Cool change hits Sydney after temperatures top 40 degrees

image.altText: Mark Zuckerberg, Jeff Bezos, Sundar Pichai and Elon Musk standing on a stage

props.synopsis: While all the focus during US President Donald Trump's inauguration was on tariffs, the sight of four tech titans at the ceremony should have put another economic policy on the radar: Tax.

title.children: Trump's powerful new allies don't much like Australia

image.altText: Donald Trump and Benjamin Netanyahu shake hands.

props.synopsis: As Donald Trump reshapes America's relationship with Israel — from appointing right wing candidates as ambassadors to Israel and the UN and overturning sanctions on violent Jewish settlers — can the two-state solution survive?

title.children: The battle for a two-state solution just got a whole lot harder

image.altText: A man wears a mask, blue jumper and business shirt as he leaves court

props.synopsis: A Perth financial advisor pleads guilty to stealing more than $1 million from his clients' superannuation funds, with one couple losing $500,000 of their retirement nest egg.

title.children: Financial advisor admits stealing $1 million from clients' superannuation funds

image.altText: a man talking

props.synopsis: Health Minister Tim Nicholls unveiled the pause on Tuesday as he also announced a review into the evidence for stage one and two hormone therapies for children with gender dysphoria.

title.children: Queensland government halts hormone treatment for new trans patients under 18

image.altText: An older man with grey hair stand outside at night holding up a glass award.

props.synopsis: Brother Olly Pickett is receiving national acclaim for his work with Wheelchairs for Kids after winning Senior Australian of the Year. He says the real reward is being able to help others.

title.children: Former students inspired by teacher help elevate him to prestigious award

image.altText: a woman smiles for the camera arm-in-arm with a girl whose face is blurred out

props.synopsis: A teenage boy who was a passenger in a car allegedly stolen after the fatal stabbing of Vyleen White has been sentenced to four months' probation.

title.children: Teen passenger in 70yo stabbing victim's allegedly stolen car given probation

image.altText: woman holding child and talking on phone while using laptop

props.synopsis: Chronic connectivity and inequity in the home are partly to blame for why two-thirds of women say they feel unable to switch off from work.

title.children: Why women find it hard to switch off from work

image.altText: Shark carcass lies on the sand along the beach

props.synopsis: Research confirms a great white shark that washed up on a beach in south-west Victoria was the victim of killer whale predation.

title.children: Bite mark swabs show orcas killed 4.7m great white shark
